# Diversite

```{r, echo=FALSE}
kable(resultatsDiversiteParProfil) 
```
        
```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.width=10, fig.height=10}
radarchart(
  df = diversiteSansVariableProfil,
  caxislabels = c(0, 1, 2, 3, 4),
  pcol = c("#00AFBB", "#E7B800", "#00008B", "#FF3300", "#7FFF00")
)

legend(
  x = 0.8,  
  legend = resultatsDiversiteParProfil$Profil, 
  bty = "n", 
  pch = 20 , 
  col = c("#00AFBB", "#E7B800", "#00008B", "#FF3300", "#7FFF00"),
  text.col = "black", 
  cex = 1, 
  pt.cex = 1.5
)
```
